document_data.mainbody:
Jelethar Orgolath, who was also called the Blackscale, was a tiefling Nentyarch of the Orgolath Dynasty of Narfell.
Jelethars reign as Nentyarch was brief, lasting only from  to . He disappeared while on an expedition to the Sunrise Mountains and was presumed dead.
Jelethar was the firstborn son of Horthaun, and inherited the throne upon his fathers death in âˆ’482 DR. Since he had no children of his own, the throne passed to Jelethars younger brother Morthass upon his death.
